item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Dec 31st – (The Hide Away) NEW YEARS EVE PARTY

Join us at 8:00 pm on December 31, 2010 for an exciting time introducing the New Year 2011.

We will celebrating in the elegant Terrace Ball Room on the 2nd floor.
…
We will start the night off with entertainment by SISTER FUNK and DJ.

Food will be served from 9:00 pm to 11:00 pm
During and after dinner, dance the night away to R&B, Latin & Hip Hop music by SISTER FUNK & DJ TRACY

In addition we will be having live a champagne toast from our champagne fountain.

* ATM* Premium Liquor

* 2 FREE parking lots
* 5 min walk from Malden T-Station (Malden Taxi 781 324 5050 less than $5.00)
* Hours 8:00 pm to 1:30 am.

WE HAVE 20 ROOMS BLOCKED AT THE FAIRFEILD INN & SUITES FOR THOSE WHO WISH TO STAY OVER NIGHT. THE PRICE IS $69.00 PLUS TAX. THE ROOMS ARE UNDER BLUSH BOSTON (CODE BBNG).

**Reservations will be taken over the phone only**

Fairfield Inn & Suites
2 Eagle Rd
Saugus, MA 01906
Phone: 781 324 1900
Toll Free: 1-866-239-3204
http://www.marriott.c...

TRANSPORTATION will be provided to and from the hotel to The Hide Away at no extra cost. Please notify me once you have booked a room to schedule your pick up. (617 877 1808)
item.name: New Years Eve
